attributes.action: Force lobby groups to reveal who funds them.
attributes.additional_details:
We need to know who they really are. We can achieve this by forcing them to reveal who funds them. This is important to our democracy as their views and more importantly money could affect the decisions our politicians make.
 
Who knows where the backers of these groups originate. It is time we knew who they were and who funds them.
attributes.background: Lobby groups like the Taxpayers Alliance have grown in stature recently, appearing to have open access to the media and Westminster. It's important for our democracy that we know who funds them.
